body: What about the pages with Koneko? Will you finish them soon? Please finish them soon, I would like to see some of her.
Its okay.. But I want to see more koneko and xenovia... And maybe a bit of irina... This because theybare the least character that appears in HSDXD doujin..

Finally, some actual action involving Xenovia! She appears in one other DxD doujin, but Rias is really the only one Issei does much with... Which is understandable, of course. I mean, I'm perfectly okay with that, but... Well, to include the other girls and not have them doing anything more than being naked and/or holding Issei or his "anatomy" is just a dick move, so to speak. The physical contact (or lack thereof) aside, if I wanted to see the female characters without any clothes... Well, that's what the anime/manga/etc is there for. But yeah, good stuff here. >w<
